subject: URGENT: Your {company} account will be suspended
body:
Dear {name},

Your {company} account requires verification. Please login immediately:
{link}

Failure to verify within 24 hours will result in account suspension.

Regards,
{company} Security Team

subject: Unusual login attempt detected
body:
Hello {name},

We detected a login attempt from an unknown device. If this wasn't you, please secure your account:
{link}

{company} Support

subject: {company}: Password expired
body:
Hi {name},

Your {company} password has expired. Please update it immediately:
{link}

{company} IT Department
